description: Manage Azure API Management API Operations.

commands.name: az apim api operation create
commands.summary: Creates a new operation in the API.
examples: az apim api operation create --resource-group MyResourceGroup --service-name MyServiceName --api-id MyApiId --url-template "/session/{param1}/{param2}" --method "GET" --display-name MyOperationName --description MyDescription --template-parameters name=param1 description=descriptionContent type=paramType required="true" --template-parameters name=param2 required="false" type="string"

commands.name: az apim api operation delete
commands.summary: Deletes the specified operation in the API.
examples: az apim api operation delete --resource-group MyResourceGroup --service-name MyServiceName --api-id MyApiId --operation-id MyOperationId

commands.name: az apim api operation list
commands.summary: List a collection of the operations for the specified API.
examples: az apim api operation list --resource-group MyResourceGroup --service-name MyServiceName --api-id MyApiId

commands.name: az apim api operation show
commands.summary: Gets the details of the API Operation specified by its identifier.
examples: az apim api operation show --resource-group MyResourceGroup --service-name MyServiceName --api-id MyApiId --operation-id MyOperationId

commands.name: az apim api operation update
commands.summary: Updates the details of the operation in the API specified by its identifier.
examples: az apim api operation update --resource-group MyResourceGroup --service-name MyServiceName --api-id MyApiId --operation-id MyOperationId --method "PUT" --display-name NewDisplayName --description NewDescription
